sentence.Network_en: Please bring me the notebook with a slate - gray cover on my desk.
sentence.Network_cn: 请帮我把办公桌上的那个瓦灰色封皮的笔记本拿过来.

sentence.Network_en: The pads and nails are black or slate gray.
sentence.Network_cn: 脚垫和趾甲为黑色或暗蓝灰色.

sentence.Network_en: Flight for slate gray, with green metallic luster.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞羽为石板灰色, 具有绿色的金属光泽.

list.abs: 各种颜色的英语单词表示颜色的英语单词 ... slateblue 石蓝色 slategray 灰石色 smoky gray 烟灰色.
颜色中文名称对照表 ... LightSlateGray 浅石板灰 SlateGray 石板灰 DoderBlue 道奇蓝.

means.word_mean: 1. of the color of slate or granite;
